description: misc/emacs: stop go-mode from spuriously marking the buffer modified when it loads

messages.text:
On 2012/05/31 15:34:59, Sameer Ajmani wrote:
> LGTM

Hi Ryan,

Please sync and upload a new patch set.

Also, please sign the CLA, using the same email address that you use for your CLs:
  http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright
Since you're contributing as a Googler and Google is already in AUTHORS, you will just be added to CONTRIBUTORS.

On Thu, May 31, 2012 at 8:39 AM, <sameer@golang.org> wrote:

> On 2012/05/31 15:34:59, Sameer Ajmani wrote:
>
>> LGTM
>>
>
> Hi Ryan,
>
> Please sync and upload a new patch set.
>
> Also, please sign the CLA, using the same email address that you use for
> your CLs:
>  http://golang.org/doc/**contribute.html#copyright<http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright>


Google employees don't need to do this. Just add the email he's using to
CONTRIBUTORS and send out a "CONTRIBUTORS: Add Ryan Barrett (Google CLA)"
CL.

Cool. I still need a fresh patch, though.
On May 31, 2012 11:53 AM, "Brad Fitzpatrick" <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:

>
>
> On Thu, May 31, 2012 at 8:39 AM, <sameer@golang.org> wrote:
>
>> On 2012/05/31 15:34:59, Sameer Ajmani wrote:
>>
>>> LGTM
>>>
>>
>> Hi Ryan,
>>
>> Please sync and upload a new patch set.
>>
>> Also, please sign the CLA, using the same email address that you use for
>> your CLs:
>>  http://golang.org/doc/**contribute.html#copyright<http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright>
>
>
> Google employees don't need to do this. Just add the email he's using to
> CONTRIBUTORS and send out a "CONTRIBUTORS: Add Ryan Barrett (Google CLA)"
> CL.
>
>

On Thu, May 31, 2012 at 9:26 AM, Sameer Ajmani <sameer@golang.org> wrote:
> Cool. I still need a fresh patch, though.

done!
